Licensing Of Certain Mortgage Lenders And Brokers

law.catch_line: License Suspension Or Revocation; Notice And Hearing

text.section: the licensee has violated any provision of this chapter or any rule or regulation adopted hereunder, or any other law applicable to the conduct of its business; or
any fact or condition exists which, if it had existed at the time of the original application for such license, would have warranted the commissioner in refusing to issue such license.
